defaultError: **Unknown Error:** I'm sorry, I'm afraid I can't do that. This incident has been logged to the dashboard.

crossGuild.disabled: You have disabled posting your challenges across servers.

you can set one with `{{prefix}}help config set timezone <timezone>`.

timezone.reset: You have successfully reset your timezone.
timezone.set: You've successfully set your time zone to {{timezone}}
